allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SLIPCore - Streamlined Intragent Protocol

Core protocol implementation:
- nSLIP wire format encoder/decoder with Base62 encoding
- Acts (REQUEST, PROPOSE, INFORM, EVAL, etc.) and Frames (TASK, PLAN, OBSERVATION)
- Typed slots for goal_id, task_id, priority, status, score, tag

Dataset generators:
- Template-based generator for quick synthetic data
- LLM-enhanced generator using Ollama for diverse, realistic goals
- 6,356 training examples included (JSONL format for LoRA/QLoRA)

Claude Code integration:
- nSLIP protocol skill for parsing/generating messages
- /parse-nslip and /create-nslip slash commands
- CLAUDE.md development guide

Examples and documentation:
- Simple roundtrip and coordinator-planner demo scripts
- Protocol specification (spec/slip-spec.md)
- Finetune data format documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
